div.span: The Governor has extended school closures through April 30, 2020.
All District 23 Schools and Programs will remain CLOSED as directed.
We continue to recommend that families plan and prepare for extended school closure.
For D23 Coronavirus Updates & Distance Learning Resources visit

br.span: Each Trimester, the Administration prepares an update for our Board of Education that reviews our Strategic Plan and provides a snapshot of some of the work completed during the Trimester. Click HERE to view the report.
